relevant_findings.general: Alert and in no apparent distress.
relevant_findings.ENT: Ears and nose without visible erythema, masses, or trauma. Oropharynx without visible lesion, erythema or exudate.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Heart regular, no murmur, no S3, no S4. No JVD.
relevant_findings.respiratory: Lungs clear to auscultation with good air movement bilaterally. Breathing is non-labored.
relevant_findings.gastrointestinal: Abdomen soft, non-distended, LLQ tenderness at the site of the lovenox shots. Diminished bowel sounds are present. No rebound or guarding. Diffuse ecchymoses bilaterally at the site of lovenox injections.
relevant_findings.genitourinary: No suprapubic fullness or tenderness to palpation.
relevant_findings.musculoskeletal: Neck supple, moves all extremities, strength grossly full and symmetric bilaterally in all limbs.
relevant_findings.neurological: Alert, oriented, face symmetric, gaze conjugate with EOMI, speech fluent, moves all limbs, sensation to light touch grossly intact throughout.
